ygData.subject: Re: tiny daggers in Qeynos?
ygData.msgSnippet: Also upstairs in the academy. one level up from where you enter ... From: Ken Allred  To:  Sent: Thursday, July
ygData.messageBody:
Also upstairs in the academy. one level up from where you enter
----- Original Message -----
From: Ken Allred <thatch@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 3:43 PM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] tiny daggers in Qeynos?


> From: "Ken Allred" <thatch@...>
>
> Is there any place in Freeport to buy tiny daggers? I have looked and
> looked there for them and have not found them. If they aren't in
Freeport,
> where else (besides Erudin) can we get the daggers?
>
> Thanks.
>
> Pantharr
> So close to 20th
> Mith Marr
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Fozzle Brainbender [mailto:fozzleb@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 1:37 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] tiny daggers in Qeynos?
>
>
> From: Fozzle Brainbender <fozzleb@...>
>
>
>
> --- Tom King <rebelhawk@...> wrote:
> > From: Tom King <rebelhawk@...>
> >
> > I have just arrived in the Qeynos area and can't
> > find where to by tiny
> > daggers. I went to what I thought was all the
> > casters in the "magic" area of
> > town but I guess I missed one. Can anyone out there
> > help me out? Thanks....
>
> Sure! go to south Qeynos, and get on the boat for
> Erudine.. No tiny daggers in Qeynos =)
> BTW, Erudin enchanters are rude, and may not sell to
> you, so take your illusions with you.
>
> ===
> ------------------------------------------------
> Fozzle Brainbender
> Minister of the Winds
> Spirit of the Moon
> Enchanter, Jeweler, Short guy
